^[{-} `r blogdown::shortcode("courseinfo")`] <span class="newthought">This site contains</span> the syllabus, schedule, and assignments for MPA 630: Data Science and Statistics for Public Management, held during Fall 2018 at Brigham Young University.

By the end of this course, you will (1) be data literate and (2) be able to answer your own questions with statistical and data scientific tools.
